name: drillv01
description:
In production test of Drill. This is a simple testing room of the game's early development. Enemy collision currently disabled.

Controls:

Jump - Space

Move Left/Right - A/D

Dash - Shift

Projectile - LMB/RMB

Plan:

As of right now this is a test build to see how the game feels and functions. Much of this game is subject to change. The sounds and music will likely be replaced with new audio. The projectile function is set to change as well, alongside enemy interaction and adding a health system.
